text: Mortal Kombat is a fighting video game. It was developed by NetherRealm Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. It is the ninth main game in the Mortal Kombat series. The game was released on April 3, 2011 for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, and Microsoft Windows. ==Development== The energy meter allows the player to use techniques like the brutal X-Ray moves, with some refinements made to their system. ==Playable characters== ===Default characters=== *Cyrax *Johnny Cage *Kratos (PlayStation ports only) *Scorpion *Sektor *Shang Tsung *Sub-Zero ===Downloadable characters=== *Freddy Krueger *Kenshi *Skarlet *Rain ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2011 video games Category:Mortal Kombat Category:Warner Bros. video games Category:2.5D fighting games Category:Apocalyptic video games Category:Crossover fighting games Category:Martial arts video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation Vita games Category:Video game remakes Category:Video games about time travel Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Mortal Kombat (2011 video game)
